Who I am.

Hi! My name is Adam Hörnemalm, and I'm a 22 year old Engineering student currently enrolled in my fourth year at Umeå University, towards a degree in Interaction Technology and Design.

Since an early age I've always been interested in computers and programming, which led me down a path of pursuing front-end development as both a hobby and a career. Thanks to my education I have experience working in numerous different programming environments giving me a wide array of skills to solve any problem stood before me.


Along with my programming knowledge I'm also experienced in designing user interfaces, conducting user testing and project management.

My Education.

M.Sc. in Interaction Technology & Design.

The Master of Science Programme in Interaction Technology & Design is one part Design Theory and another part software development. Its aims are broad, with professions like UX-Designer and full-stack developer both being possible upon graduation.
